description: This vegan scramble is perfect for a quick, easy and healthy breakfast or brunch served on toast.
name: Mushroom & Tofu Scramble Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Crumble the tofu into a bowl with your hands, breaking into small pieces.

Heat half the oil in a large, non-stick frying pan on a medium high heat and add the spring onions, turmeric and garlic. Cook for 3-4 minutes, crumble in the tofu and stir in half the lemon juice. Cook for 2- 3 minutes, stirring all the time.
Add remaining oil, mushrooms and spinach and cook for 5 more minutes. Remove from the hit and stir in the nutritional yeast flakes and more lemon juice to taste.
Toast the sourdough and serve topped with the mushroom and tofu scramble on top, with hot sauce on the side.
